ygData.subject: Re: Buying advice needed...
ygData.msgSnippet: Get a runed totem staff. You can buy one from players for 20-30 pp or camp out in Infected Paw to get one. Shaman Ren Rex there has it. It gives you mana and
ygData.messageBody:
Get a runed totem staff. You can buy one from players for 20-30 pp or
camp out in Infected Paw to get one. Shaman Ren Rex there has it. It
gives you mana and allows you to hit magic creatures. A savant cap may
also be a good thing (about same price) depending on how you want to
play. It gives you +3 int/wiz to give you more mana. =)

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
*Mobile Nuclear Missile Library*

Phil Showalter wrote:
>
> From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>
>
> If this question isn't appropriate for this list, let me apologize in
> advance.... I don't see many questions like it....
> Anyway,
> I'm a lvl 12 Gnome wizard, have cloth armor, worn great staff, Sr.
> Apprentice Robe and pretty much all the spells that I want (that I can buy).
> I've got 25 plat or so in the bank and don't know what to spend it
> on....invest in better armor? better staff? magic items? if so, what? don't
> know what's smartest. Would very much appreciate any advice anyone can give
> me that wish's they'd bought or didn't buy at my level. Thanx for any help
> you can give me.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> It's finally here! What's your opinion?
